DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The trial aim investigate blood glucose control biphasic insulin aspart 50 least effective treatment biphasic insulin aspart 30 combination metformin .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Biphasic Insulin Aspart 50 Blood Glucose Control Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Currently treat premix human insulin twice daily without oral antidiabetic drug least 3 month HbA1c ( Glycosylated Haemoglobin A1c ) 7.5 % 12.0 % ( inclusive ) FPG ( Fasting Plasma Glucose ) high 7.0 mmol/L BMI ( Body Mass Index ) 2340 kg/sq.m ( inclusive ) Metformin contraindication accord local practice Systemic use TZDs ( thiazolidinediones ) 1 month within 6 month prior trial
